eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Maricopa, AZ; at 07:00 PM ON JAN 15, 2026 Effective until 03:00 AM JAN 16, 2026. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Maricopa County. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. The Phoenix Police is looking for John Cottrell Watts last seen on foot near N 27th Ave and W Ocotillo wearing black / white/ brown hooded sweatshirt, black pants, and black shoes. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
